entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handle `required` language feature in APICompat #26600
  • CppUnitTestFramework is being included in linux .NET SDK #26590
  • `sudo dotnet workload --help` segfaults on Apple M1 in .NET 7 Preview 6 #26587
  • Global suppressions in compatibility suppression files don't work for both baseline and non baselined comparisons #26585
    7.0.1xx
  • Allow dotnet publish to use --runtimes #26584

Closed

  • Can not find the installed .NET SDK on raspberry pi 3b to run .NET app on VS Code #26487
    Discussion
  • Regression in the .Net SDK 6.0.302. It fails compiling MvvmGen projects using WPF which compile correctly if you use .Net SDK 6.0.300 #26581

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1881979 #26571
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Stabilize branding #26592
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding test scenarios for publish AOT debug files #26392
    Area-NativeAOT
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1876462 #26531
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26500
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Delete unnecessary test project files #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
